name: Light-Robo
description:
This game was made for The Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2 (https://itch.io/jam/brackeys-8). 

IMPORTATNT: This was made by me in C and OpenGL, as a challenge to learn OpenGL. Since my goal was to learn OpenGL and not make a game, this "Game" is highly buggy, unstable, and not fun to play. It also uses up  a lot of ram(60%), gpu and cpu on my potato pc(i3-8th gen, 4 gb ram, intel uhd 630 integrated gpu). So if your pc is worse than mine, I recommend you not run this "game".

Souce code if you're interested: https://github.com/Hemanth3303/Brackeys-Game-Jam-2022.2-Submission (highly suggest to not look at it if you don't want to die from cringe)
